thread.title_full: A Fraud!! - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: IrKap334
title: A Fraud!!
text:
Don't trust this hotel! I have been a Traveller since I am a child and I have never in my life had a problem that a hotel charges more than they write to you in an email confirmation! It is an outrageous situation - they send to you on purpose the "official reconfirmation", where it's stated in clear writing "After the time above mentioned we charge the cost of the first night as No Show." However, turns out that they send another email before the official one, where they write in small font that they charge you half of the stay!
And in addition to that, when I called to deal with the situation, a person named Claudio laughed at me and said that it is my problem.
I am planning on making a reservation again next week, but I am not choosing a hotel that makes money in such a way.
